## dplyr (Data Frame - plier) ![](dplyr.png){width=80px fit-align="right"}

:::{.incremental}
- Grammar of data manipulation 

- Providing a consistent set of **verbs**

- `mutate()` adds new variables that are functions or existing 
variables 

- `select()` picks variables based on their names 

- `filter()` picks cases based on their values 

- `summarise()` reduces multiple values down to a single summary 

- `arrange()` changes the ordering of the rows
:::

## Bringing in Palmer Penguins **and** tidyverse

```{.r code-line-numbers="|1-2|4-5"}
install.packages("palmerpenguins") 
install.packages("tidyverse")

library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```
